author: Ben Garrett
description: A DOSBox-based MS-DOS emulator for the web
name: dosee

scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 -s src/**/**/* src/**/* src/* build && copyup -sf node_modules/mini.css/dist/mini-default.css build/css && copyup -sf node_modules/browserfs/dist/browserfs.js node_modules/browserfs-zipfs-extras/dist/browserfs-zipfs-extras.js node_modules/file-saver-fixed/dist/FileSaver.js node_modules/canvas-toBlob/canvas-toBlob.js build/js
